title: Types of Bonds in Atoms and Molecules Quiz
topic: Types of Bonds in Atoms and Molecules
description: This quiz will test your knowledge of the different types of bonds in atoms and molecules.

questions.questionName: Which type of bond involves the sharing of electrons?
questions.explanation: Covalent bonds involve the sharing of electrons by two atoms.

questions.questionName: Which type of bond involves the transfer of electrons from one atom to another and the formation of ions?
questions.explanation: Ionic bonds involve the transfer of electrons from one atom to another and the formation of ions.

questions.questionName: Which type of bond involves the attraction between a hydrogen atom and a more electronegative atom?
questions.explanation: Hydrogen bonds involve the attraction between a hydrogen atom and a more electronegative atom.

questions.questionName: Which type of bond involves electrostatic attractions between molecules due to temporary dipoles?
questions.explanation: Van der Waals bonds involve electrostatic attractions between molecules due to temporary dipoles.
